episodes.title: Usopp Shisu?! Luffy Jouriku wa Mada?
episodes.plot: After Zoro escapes with Nami's help, she tries to prove her loyalty to the Arlong Pirates by appearing to kill Usopp. Meanwhile, Luffy's group finally arrives at the island.

episodes.title: Zen'in Shuuketsu! Usopp ga Kataru Nami no Shinjitsu
episodes.plot: Luffy, Sanji, and Yosaku made a crash landing in the plains of the island. Zoro(who got ran over by their boat) tells them that he needs to go rescue Usopp from the mermen. Only when Johnny came by all depressed and told them that Usopp has been killed by Nami. Either one of them, including Luffy couldn't believe it. Luffy declined that it's a lie, but Johnny wished that was true. Then Nami comes by and just told them all solemnly that the only reason she was with Luffy was for the money and nothing more. Sanji admired the way Nami acted serious, but Zoro corrects him...

episodes.title: Himerareta Kako! Onna Senshi Bell-mere!
episodes.plot: Nojiko starts her story about Nami's childhood and their adopted mother, Bellemere. Despite being poor and none of them being related by blood, they had a happy life.

episodes.title: Ikinuke! Haha Bellemere to Nami no Kizuna!
episodes.plot: Nojiko continues her story, explaining how their life was ruined when the Arlong Pirates first took over the village.

episodes.title: Luffy Tatsu! Uragirareta Yakusoku no Ketsumatsu!
episodes.plot: When marine officers under Arlong confiscate Nami's money, the villagers start a rebelion. Desperate, Nami asks Luffy for help.

episodes.title: Luffy Dai Pinch! Gyojin Tai Luffy Kaizokudan
episodes.plot: The Straw Hats face the Fishmen themselves as the villagers watch from the sidelines.

episodes.title: Luffy Suibotsu! Zoro vs Tako no Hacchan
episodes.plot: Arlong has trapped Luffy in the ocean and Zoro faces the six-sword wielding octopus Hatchan.

episodes.title: Hokoritakaki Senshi! Gekitou Sanji to Usopp
episodes.plot: Sanji was about to help Luffy out, until Kurobi swam and knocked Sanji out. He continuously beat Sanji up with his karate moves. And didn't gave him a chance to resurface for air. Kurobi goes on how inferior Humans are when it comes to needing air to survive. As Sanji is running out of breathe, he discovers that Kurobi has gills like a fish. Which means that Kurobi will be useless if his own gills were damaged. So he bit Kurobi's gills and resurfaced to breathe again. Kurobi also resurfaced and told Sanji that it's doesn't matter if the battle in underwater or on land...

episodes.title: Luffy Zenkai! Nami no Ketsui to Mugiwara Boushi
episodes.plot: With Arlong's officers defeated Zoro and Sanji take on Arlong but prove that they aren't a match for him. However, with Luffy finally free, he takes on Arlong himself.

episodes.title: Sakuretsu! Gyojin Arlong Umi kara no Moukougeki!
episodes.plot: Luffy returns to the fight, and the battle with Arlong versus Luffy begins.

episodes.title: Gyojin Teikoku no Owari! Nami wa Ore no Nakama Da!
episodes.plot: The battle spreads into Arlong Park itself and Arlong is no longer holding back.

episodes.title: Egao no Tabidachi! Saraba Furusato Cocoyashi Mura
episodes.plot: Arlong's reign of terror is over, and no one has anything on their mind except to party. As the crew celebrates, Nami reflects on her hometown and decides to officially join the Straw Hat Pirates.

episodes.title: Mugiwara o Oe! Chiisana Buggy no Daibouken
episodes.plot: It's morning, and the Straw Hat Pirates are enjoying their breakfast. Nami remembered when she and Luffy first meet, back when they encountered Buggy the Clown. Nami asked Luffy, if he'd know what had happen to Buggy. Luffy doesn't have a slight clue, but figures he's somewhere far away. Meanwhile on an island, the clown of terror himself, Buggy has spent his time wisely on the island Luffy punched him to the last time they met. He's shorter because he lost his parts from the last time. So he is now the height of a circus midget. He built a raft, and heads off to find...

episodes.title: Omachikane! Aa Fukkatsu no Buggy Senchou!
episodes.plot: Buggy tells the mystery woman he's accompanied with. That he's planning to find his old crew. Meanwhile we learn that that the Buggy Crew had escaped from the angry mob of villagers and had to cat off cowardly. Mohji and Cabaji both were worried on what became of their captain. As the only thing they have left of him are his parts(which were all gathered and tied up thanks to Nami). Mohji blamed Nami for Buggy to loose his parts. While Cabaji has a grudge for being defeated by Zoro. The crew heads for a tropical island and made a memorial for Buggy. As they presume ...

episodes.title: Hajimari to Owari no Machi: Loguetown Jouriku
episodes.plot: The Straw Hat Pirate Crew, has finally made it to LougeTown. The place where the famous Pirate King Gold Roger was born, raised, and died in. Luffy looks forward in seeing Gold Roger's execution platform. Meanwhile familiar enemies are lurking the town.

episodes.title: Sandai Kitetsu to Yubashiri! Zoro no Shintou to Onna Souchou
episodes.plot: While searching for a pair of new swords to replace the ones shattered by Mihawk, Zoro meets a woman named Tashigi. At first site, she looks exactly like Kuina.

episodes.title: Usopp Tai Kozure no Daddy: Mahiru no Kettou
episodes.plot: Usopp manages to anger the daughter of bounty hunter Daddy the Father. All because he wanted a pair of new goggles, that were meant to be a gift for Daddy. Usopp finds his own life at stake, when Daddy challenges him over a duel to claim the goggles.
